predicate.note: Frames file for 'delineate' based on sentences in ectb2. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'outline' and 'define'.

roleset.name: to outline, define, or specify features

role.descr: entity whose features are being outlined, define

example.text: Sharp lines delineate big, protruding eyes and tightly closed lips.
example.arg: big, protruding eyes and tightly closed lips.
